item.title: Running ikiwiki in Merecat httpd
item.author: troglobit@gmail.com (Joachim Nilsson)
item.description: This is a HowTo for setting up ikiwiki with Merecat httpd. First install ikiwiki $ sudo apt install ikiwiki libcgi-session-perl libcgi-formbuilder-perl Follow the steps to setup a new Wiki or Blog. In this example we set up a wiki in our ~/public_html: $ ikiwiki --setup /etc/ikiwiki/auto.setup ... Successfully set up wiki: url: http://localhost/~jocke/wiki srcdir: ~/wiki destdir: ~/public_html/wiki repository: ~/wiki.git To modify settings, edit ~/home.setup and then run: $ ikiwiki --setup ~/home.
